actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that application of the antitrust laws to certain practices of professional sports leagues should be clarified, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that: (1) professional sports leagues and member clubs must follow policies that protect the interests of existing sports communities and promote league expansion; (2) the Supreme Court should resolve the Federal antitrust questions involved in the relocation of professional sports teams; and (3) Congress should consider legislation to protect the public interest in team relocation matters.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that application of the antitrust laws to certain practices of professional sports leagues should be clarified, and for other purposes.
